captions.text:
You're looking at me, right?
Only me, right?

But they all say
you're looking at them

You're smiling at me, right?
The smile I can feel only

My seatmate says she feels it
How come it's possible

I used to hate English
Now I like it

Perhaps I could
become an English teacher

oh my god
I love english teacher

I'll tell courage
and tell him today

Don't pretend
you didn't hear anything

kung kung, my heart flutters
kung kung, he's coming now

What do I do
My heart says kung kung

I know I'm lovesick
It looks obvious on my face

After all I'm just
getting anxious

Wait for me
I’ll be your girl

Just small age difference
We're student and teacher now

But wait
We'll be like friends next year

Don't be confused
Even I get confused

I think of you more and more
I know you're the same

I used to doze off
but now I like English class

Perhaps I could
be an English teacher

oh my god
I love english teacher
Now I'm telling you daringly
Don't laugh like that

kung kung, my heart flutters
kung kung, he's coming now

What do I do
My heart says kung kung

I know I'm lovesick
It looks obvious on my face

After all I'm just
getting anxious

Wait for me
I’ll be your girl oh oh

You love me
love  me tonight

I feel like I could fly in the sky
I call your name quietly

Wait for me today
I love your sweet words, I love you

Tomorrow's different
You're in my dream everyday
Then you'll say to me again

I love you
You love me tonight oh

I love you
You love me tonight oh yeh

I love you
You love me tonight yeh
Go to class,quickly!
Be quiet, we'll start class
Turn your pages

My student teacher
NC.A

School Reality: A bullshit ass class with many people who try to annoy you,

being alone making freaking homework ;_; Why life can't be like this M/V? 
Too good to be true I guess...﻿
